content.detailedDescription:
My husband was taking photos of the solar eclipse on 10/23/14. he was taking photos through an 8inch reflector with a solar filter and a 25 millimeter plossl lens.

while sorting through his photos - the one attached stood out.

while examining the photo and comparing it to others taken at the same time, this is not a solar flare. a solar flare was actually caught on another photo. this object is much larger and closer to the earth.

the object was not visible through the camera to the naked eye.
content.summary: This photo was taken through a telescope lense of the solar eclipse

content.detailedDescription: I was at my home just outside of ironton ohio. it was late and dark outside.It was a clear night. i proceeded to take my house dog outside for a bathroom break and to get the mail. the time was approximately 9pm. i looked at the local power plant (duke energy) and noted a brighter them normal star hovering above the plant and possibly over us 52. then. the object appeared orange/red like fire. it was motionless. it dimmed away. then came back and gave birth to an object the same size and color. this object moved to my right of the first object. then the new object gave birth to a third. this third object moved to the right as well. at this moment the we're all the same size, color and shape. they were at equal distance apart. the all dimmed away and vanished. i told my wife inside the house. she came outside. now, another orb had reappeared. it was identical to the ones i had seen. it dimmed away as well. she notified her parents who live next door. my mother in law came out side and witnessed a similar event shortly after us. it made us very anxious and yet left us reeling with amazement. other stars and planes were visible at the time, however nothing compared to these objects.
content.summary: Orange orbs that emerged from each other then faded away

content.detailedDescription:
My father had taken a walk sometime earlier in the day and came back to our cabin located on 7 caves road in hightland county between the villages of bainbridge and rainsboro, oh.  this was either in the spring or fall of 1948!  we had moved there a year or so earlier from chillicothe.  he seemed very excited and kept telling me he had seen something, a huge owl in an old dilapidated barn located across us 50 which was undergoing some construction at the time.  a new widened section with a new bridge was being built.  he was acting strange and agitated telling me he wanted me to see the owl.  we walked across a fallow farm field that was uncultivated and wild with weeds and undergrowth.  we went in the barn and he kept saying how amazing the owl was!  as we entered the barn he began pointing excitedly to a cross beam strut maybe 20 or 30 feet above the barn floor.  when it was obvious that the owl wasn't there, he seemed to be confused and disoriented and kept telling me about how beautiful the owl was.  we stood in there maybe 5 or 10 minutes while he tried to tell me about his encounter.  we returned home and my grandmother, his mother was preparing a meal.  it was like he completely forgot about the event.  i remember asking him sometime later about the owl and it was like it never happened.
the reason i chose to write this report was years later i saw a very large object in the dark of what appeared to be a very large owl resting up in a tree at night.  suddenly the bird or winged creature descended down out of the branches of a tree adjacent to buffalo bayou in houston on a property our group was leasing for a men's association dedicated to exploring many issues men face in a changing social environment since the women's lib movement began in the 60's.  this was about 1993 or 1994.  something jogged my memory about these two events and their possible connection to each other though separated by decades of time.
content.summary: My father said earlier in the day he had gone into a barn and saw a huge owl resting on a beam!  he came back to our house and took me there!  i saw nothing, but he was very excited

content.detailedDescription:
I was performing a live webcast of the partial solar eclipse on youtube today with an 8" meade lx200 @ f/6.3 and samsung sdc-435 camera.  it was just minutes before the start of the eclipse and i had just shown the area of the sun where the moon would appear.  i slewed the telescope back to the center of the sun where a large sunspot region was present.  suddenly i saw two clusters of objects slowly transit the sunspot and i followed it until it left the sun's disc.  it was too slow and large to be satellites, not shaped like a plane or weather balloon, and there were what appeared to something trailing directly behind it as well.  i don't know exactly how to describe the shape, but something appeared to be trailing it.  the clusters changed orientation over time.  fortunately, since i was webcasting this live on my youtube channel, the entire video is recorded from start to finish.  

i commented at the time that it might be balloons and indeed there is a barrier island across the bay from where my telescope was looking, but i do not understand why there are two separate, distinct clusters that remain at a fixed distance from each other.

here is the recording of the webcast, starting at the beginning of the sighting:
[linik moved to fi section/cms/tg]

it might simply be balloons but i thought it worth reporting and one of my viewers recommended this page.
content.summary: Two clusters of circular objects, with straight lines trailing behind them

content.detailedDescription:
Shortly after 9pm on 21oct14 i was in my back yard (in dallas center, ia -- about 15 miles nw of west des moines) walking our dog and was staring up at the stars.  we have large trees that are behind and to my left as i was facing north.  the neighbors have large trees to west and nw and my 2nd floor of my house blocks lower view of the east but i have unobstructed views to the north and straight up.

i soon noticed a very bright light that was straight north and slightly left.  it was moving from the nw to the se at a quick pace so i originally thought it was a life flight helicopter that left it's spotlight on but then i noticed there were no navigation lights blinking or otherwise.  i could not hear it so am guessing it was higher up and several miles to my north.  as i was watching it i noticed a smaller airplane (approx. twin engine - 2,000 to 5,000 feet up) coming from the des moines area and it was moving straight at the light (nw) - not sure if they were at the same elevation or not.  i was focused on the bright light moving and before the small plane could get into my main vision, the light began reducing in size and curving easterly and almost northeast.  but i think it gave that directional appearance because it was ascending (appeared to be) quickly.  within a few seconds of beginning the "curve" east/northeast it had reduced to nothing and blended in with the stars.  once it began the change in direction, the new path resembled a y=x(squared) curve.

also - i am former usaf and can readily identify different types of aircraft and this was not a traditional aircraft.
content.summary: Bright light moved from nw to n then ascended rapidly and reduced in size

content.detailedDescription:
In house and next to it
when i watched cameras cause we had heard noise so went back to check cameras 
a fairy 
a hovering pencil shape and all over the place but mainly watching inside my house
never knew it was there until checked cameras and had not returned
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Not a ufo but something i have never seen and have been watching cameras and has not returned

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog about 1:30 am. i always look in the sky when walking my dog. on this night i noticed an orange sphere light over siesta key beach that was floating over the ocean. the beach is 1 mile away from my house.It was quite large. looking at it from 1 mile away, it was just a bit smaller than a dime, so i would imagine it would be quite large if i was standing underneath it. it was very bright and it moved from right to left and stopped. then it moved back right and stopped, always staying at the same height. then it started to shrink until it disappeared. i stood there for 5 min watching. 5 minutes later it reappeared in same spot. moved a few more times, and shrunk yet again. in the 15 years living in this house i always have looked up at night, but i have never seen anything like this.

it seems on ufostalker there are multiple sightings of the same object off and around siesta key beach in sarasota. this video i found is exactly what i saw. i did remark on this page. please look at this video.
  
[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange sphere hovering over beach/ocean disapearing and reapearing

content.detailedDescription:
Three of us had recently graduated from high school, the year was 1971 and we had a summer job together working at harvesting alfalfa hay during a 12 hour night shift.  we worked 7 days a week, starting at 6 in the evening and ending 6 in the morning.  driving an open tractor (no cab, no windows) every night, we had complete vision of the night sky every night for 3 months in the summer.  i had seen many things i could not explain, lots of green lights coming from the ground into the night sky like exploding electrical transformers, but they would come and go and not think much about them, sometimes we would see light rays like search lights, but again, unexplainable but no big deal, we also saw many, many meteorties. 

 but this night was a real freak out deal.  i was staning on top of a large piece of machinery (tall covered hay trailer) scooping off the hay that had blown onto the lid of this covered hay trailer, and as i was pitching the hay off the top onto the ground below and swinging the pitch fork up in the air, my eyes caught a bright large shimmering metallic object off to the north, maybe 25 degrees off the horizon from my viewpoint.  it wasn't very high off the ground, maybe 1,000'  i watched it momentarily then hollered at my 2 friends down on the ground.  i was elevated on top of the trailer about 15' high.  as i pointed at the object and hollered at them to "look at that", we all watched this cigar shaped shimmering object maybe only 1-2 miles away. judging from the size of it, it was close enough to hear propulsion noise if it was a conventional manmade aircraft, but it made none. the sun was starting to light the sky from the east and the stars were growing dimmer and we could see the surface was shimmering like an aluminum jet airliner reflecting the early light of day, the object was so illuminated it seemed like it was 3 times as large as a jetliner fuselage with no wings or tail.  it had blinking lights and darker areas that would seem like windows.  the entire fuselage would change colors from greens to blues to silver.  the spectacular thing was that it hovered for some time, but then when it started to move, it darted, then stopped, then changed direction in a completely different direction as if it was drawing the number "4" in the dark sky about as fast as zorro would swipe his sword, then it sped off into the distance directly away from us at a speed so fast it merely vanished out of sight. we vowed nobody would believe us, and we weren't going to talk about it, but the next day the local newspaper was alive with headlines of stories of people seeing this exact same thing across the state across a distance of 200-300 miles.  we know it was ufo, nothing else this large can move eradically across the sky, and speed away so fast.  i have shared this story with all my believing friends. it burned a visual in my mind that will never be erased.  too unbelievable, but seeing is believing.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Shimmering blinking object seen early in morning, size 3 times that of jet fusealage.

content.detailedDescription:
I tried to submit this to unsealedfiles.Co but iam being banned from tht site. well, heres my description that none believes.
after finishing my 12th grade, i got a membership to play tennis in a court about 3km from my house.I usually go there by cycling.
i regulary leave my home about 5.15 am in morning. the streets will be empty,abandoned as everyone ll be sleeping.As usual, i started out early, around 5.10am--dark twilight sky.When i was about 100m from my home , i saw a bright star.I initially thought it was stationary but i recogninised it was not. it flew in a zig zag circular pattern initially
and then in an oblique pattern and then disappeared. this happenned in a highspeed irregular motion.Since i was moving along the path it followed in the sky. i lost it when i entered a narrow street where buildings hid it.Since it was sky high, star like, i was not scared. please trust me .None around me believes this. this happened 2yrs ago.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: This s true,the ufo was star like,went in zig zag curves,high speed,i observed it for approx,30-60secs.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the porch, a bright light fell from the sky it hovered for about a min, then disappeared.There was a trail of light above it.
content.summary: Light fell and hovered

content.detailedDescription: Was outside star gazing, noticed  a  star moving so i became focused on it. it moved etremly slow towards me  coming from the stars it finally  reached the trees., lowered behind a branch then went above it and over decending in front of it then moved left and hovered above the road. after watching it i ran into the house  , had my son come out to see it, by the time we got outside  it was gone. i looked around and spotted it, pointed it out to my son. he said its just a star, went back inside. it took about an hour to decend to me but seconds to leave.....
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was star gazing saw star moving

content.detailedDescription: Appeared toward down town, hovered, just after another hovered beside the first object yet slightly below. hovered about 5-6 min. then disappeared. snot much to tell
content.summary: One object appeared , hovered then another did the same

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were driving and talking in rural east-central illinois around 11 pm at night. we pulled off into a backroad that was tucked away in a somewhat open valley, surrounded by trees on all sides. as we were cruising around and talking (driving east), we noticed a very odd light in the sky (the sky was also very clear) that was just over the treetops in the distance, thinking it was a cell tower. we realized very quickly that there was not a cell tower in that direction whatsoever. at this point, we assumed we were either looking at a helicopter or some sort of commercial aircraft that was flying west. we got out of the car to watch it, and shortly after, the light, which began to blink and pulsate, dispersed into 8-10 smaller lights. my friend and i had no idea what to think at this point.

each light had a very light-bluish and whitish coloration. they all blinked with no apparent pattern whatsoever, and were also not in any organized formation of sorts upon dispersion. also, as each light blinked randomly, there seemed to be some sort of "aura" that pulsated about it, in a much more rich color than the light that was blinking. another interesting thing to note was that each of these lights "danced" around within a circle vicinity as they blinked and pulsated. there was absolutely no sound heard.

we pretty much ruled out commercial aircraft after these events. the lights continued this same behavior for close to 10 minutes, then all but one of the lights began to move, though they continued in the same movement pattern - dancing around in a circle while pulsating and blinking. all but one of the lights disappeared behind the treetops, and we did not see them again. there was one light left, still blinking and pulsating. we realized that this was the biggest light out of all of them. it continued this behavior for another solid minute, then suddenly the shape of the light sort of "flatlined."  it turned into a straight light, then moved in the night sky what had to of been a few miles within a second. it turned from this circular, starlike shape to a straight line, and zipped from one area to another in a second, then returned to its original form and behavior. almost directly after this, we noticed that it was getting brighter and appeared to be moving in our direction, so we decided to leave. unfortunately, due to the fact that we only had our iphones on us and no type of complex camera (night vision, etc.), we were not able to capture these lights on film. we also did not make an audio recording of it, as each light emitted no sound whatsoever.

we got about halfway down this road when i turned around and the light - and all other lights - had disappeared. it was an incredible experience, probably the most irrational thing that both of us had ever seen in our lives so far. there was simply no explanation for it.
content.summary: 6-10 pulsating bright lights

content.detailedDescription: We always sit and watch the stars in the evening a friend and me and we noticed a starlike object moving iin the sky i had my phone with me and started to record it (galaxy s2)
content.summary: Floating starlike object moving slowly

content.detailedDescription:
On wednesday, october 15, 2014 at approximately 5:30 p.M., while driving east bound on i-64 just prior to entering the charleston, wv metro area, i observed an object, that appeared to be cigar or cylinder shaped, hovering maybe 500 feet above the city valley area, closer to the west end of the city.

the interstate at this point is elevated above the city, which sits closer to river level. so my view of the object appeared to be straight on.

there were periods of rain and sunshine in the area during my travels, and several rainbows had appeared. i had attempted to take a few pictures of the rainbows, and while observing the rainbows, i then noticed the object.

at first, i thought it was a small airplane, as yeager airport is nearby. it was silver-mettallic in appearance, and was reflecting part of the bright sun that had caused the rainbows to appear during the intermittant rain showers. it looked cigar shaped, and appeared to just be hovering, but from living nearby yeager airport, and after having served in the u.S. navy aboard an aircraft carrier for several years, i was/am aware that planes can have the appearance of being stationary, despite actually moving. initially as i rounded a large curve n the interstate, the object was ahead of me, hovering over the valley. it did not appear to be very high in the sky at that point.  as it reflected light from what i would refer to as its fuselage, i stared to think maybe it was a little odd.

as i moved further down the interstate, eastward bound, i continued to approach closer to the object. it didn't appear to have wings or engines or a propellar, but i stil couldn't rule out an airplane based on previous experience with aircraft sitightings and knowing that depending on the angle in which they are viewed, features of an airplane are not always visible.

traffic was fairly heavy at that time, so i had to keep making quick glances at the object, and then turn back to the traffic and road around me.

the entire sighting lasted about 1.5 minutes. as i reached a point on the interstate where i was looking at what i would call the very rear of the object, i thought for about 2-3 seconds that maybe it was a miliatary style helicpter with the large dual rotors in the front and back. upon further attempts of examination (keep in mind, i had to keep making quick glances at the object, then back to the road and traffic) it appeared to have a large chevron at the very front tip of the object, and a very large chevron of equal size at the very rear of the object. it appeared to be moving north at this point, away from y location on the interstate. there was no trail of exhaust or anything of that nature, and no detectable sound.

i glanced for a very split second at the road, and then immediately back to the object, but it was no longer there.

this is an open valley area, and from the perspective of the interstate positioning i was in, i could literally see for miles in the direction of north over my left shoulder. there were clouds a couple of miles ahead of the direction the object appeared to be headed in, and several hundred feet above the elevation the object appeared to be situated in, but none in the immediate area for the object to "fly into." it had instantly and completely disappeared from view in the amount it takes to glance from left to forward and then back to the left.

i do not know if maybe it was a drone, or some other type of small aircraft. it was hard to judge the size of the object, but i would say it was between 10-20 feet, but the lcoation of the chevrons/wings on the object and the way it was just no longer in sight in an area where i should have been able to view it for miles made it seeem odd, almost as if it was observing the rainbows or the rain showers as well.

i cannot say that i know it was an extra-terrestrial craft, but it just struck me as odd the way it appeared to hover lower to the ground than a normal small craft would, and then the appearance of the object initially looking as if it had no wings/appeandages and later looking as if it had large wings or chevrons in the front and rear, and then its eventual disappearance from sight altogether in an instant. maybe nothing to it at all, just struck me as odd.
content.summary: While driving observed stationary cigar shaped object. it then appeared to moved northeast, then was just gone, disappeared.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the verrazzano bridge and this space ship came out of nowhere, in the middle of the night, and it stopped, hovered over me shined a light next to me and the car next to me swerved and then swerved again and the light followed it, and the car just kept on moving and the ship wen down to one of the pillars on the bridge and then it did like a u turn and it was big, like really really big and i got scared and called my friend but i did not say anything to her, and the ship went out of like control and sped way off into the south west before turning east toward coney island park. then it sank out of the view and onto the horizon.
content.summary: I was driving the verrazano and this huge space ship with coloredlights flew over the bridge, hovered then changed directions

content.detailedDescription:
Daughter came home from school at nite, excited to tell me what she just observed (within 5 min of her seeing it).  i made her immediately draw a picture of it and it appeared to be a chevron shape, typical of what i've seen in literature & photo's.  my daughter has never seen crafts of this type or their shape/size, so the story below was a surprise to me.

she was proceeding north on davison rd when she noticed a black object dart north then south in the sky.  she looked to her left (west) and she saw the black chevron with 2 lights on each section.  it stopped moving.   she stopped her car & watched it for a minute (of course took no picture) then started to drive off again.  the object again darted north then south, as if trying to draw her attention.  she stopped her car again and rolled the window down.  the craft was silent & hung in the air above the tree tops a few hundred feet west of her car.  she looked down for a few seconds then looked up again and the object disappeared.  she looked around for it but it had literally disappeared.  she got back in her car & drove home to tell us about the incident.  we looked at the sky and could see nothing there.  it was >3 hrs after sunset but the sky was a grey/black, impacted by the light pollution of major shopping areas 5-10 miles further to the west. therefore it was easy to see such a darkly contrasting object if it were still there.  my son, wife & i saw nothing.  my daughter was nervous & a bit shaken
content.summary: Chevron shape with 2 white lights on each section

content.detailedDescription: It was moving slowly slowly in the sky and then it come forward to us and stop and then move backward and gone
content.summary: It was just like fireball just gone

content.detailedDescription: Dog barked, wife woke up and saw bright light in sky outside bedroom window. by the time i woke up light had dimmed a bit. it was hovering. seemed as could have been over farm land behind house. at first i thought it was a burning star. bright gold in color, then turned reddish. it looked like it had a tail similiar to a scorpion. after 4-5 minutes it went straight up, paused and then took off to the south out of sight.
content.summary: Dog barked, woke up to very bright light. then light seemed to fad a little.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)

content.detailedDescription:
It was almost exactly 110 yards long, when coming in sideways it looks round if viewed at night from a distance, with part of it a blue glow the other part a green glow. 

i know that on the inside there are 5 of what we would call levers. i know what the fuel is, i know that you haven't even figured out what the fuel is, you have only figured out the cloak. i know why you haven't found any of them that were in it. i know what i'm looking for if trying to find one from there. i know where "there" is.

i know that if you didn't dismantle it to the point of not being to put it back together that with me plus 4 people of your choice, i can get it off the ground. i know what the fuel is, i know where to find the fuel, i know the physics behind how it gets off the ground and flies down to the mathematical formulae, i know how to understand their native language as easily as i understand english, i know one of them by name, and i know if you want any of this information that you will fly me out there to meet with you, and make me permanently hired with a sweet salary. the gmail that i provided will get you a fast response, do not share that email, it currently gets 0 spam.

most importantly as i have demonstrated ever since the time that you contacted me to confirm that you found my original detailed report to be completely legit, i know how to keep my mouth shut.
content.summary: I know a lot more than i said when i originally reported it. i have set the description on here to unknowns, so people can't false report ufos.

content.detailedDescription: For about 20 days or so i have been observing this star like object here in ottawa and about a week ago it was moving very slightly and pulsing like crazy it is always there in the southern skies at about 2 to 5 am or so with no clouds it seems to blink an awful lot and never fails to show up. so i bought a pair of binoculars and this object just blinks away like crazy but when i look at it with binoculars it does not blink. when i look at it with my naked eyes it blinks faded rapid colors to hard to distinguish. i wish i had a telescope and you all at mufon could see this thing as it keeps on coming back. tonight it is not moving that i can notice but this always seems to change if i look at it long enough. i invite you to see this thing from my location it will be there. it always is. it is not the international space station it is not a star or a plane i am sober all the time i do not do drugs. i am perfectly sane and do not have time to make stuff up i have never been declared insane i do not have a criminal record i just need someone to see this for themselves. at this very moment i am going back out to take another look and keep watching. my next step is to contact the ottawa international airport and see if they will tell me if they have seen anything. please call me and email me . send someone out here on a clear night to see for themselves . i will not waste your time. this is very real. thank you for reading this and consider it truth. it happens south of downtown ottawa and i need answers.
content.summary: This was not a star but looked like one stars don't dance or flash like this.

content.detailedDescription:
I believe it was the spring of '67. my mother, brother and i were in the back yard watching a lunar event. it was to the right of our back yard. as soon as it finished my brother and i caught a flash out our left eye. there was a cloud in the sky. a perfect saucer popped out from behind it, stopped for 5 seconds, then took off at a 45 degree angle at an impossible speed. we both screamed.
since then i have had many encounters with them. i would very much like to talk to the people from mufon......Please help me.

cts
content.summary: I saw the first when i was 7. many encounters since then.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my yard observing the stars tonight when i noticed movement to my right ( the east ) as i looked in that direction i noticed something gray in color flying towards me at a very high rate of speed ( it reminded me of a dove in flight )  as i turned towards it  it flew over me , past me , then as i attempted to turn my head to follow it it flew out of sight towards the west all in a matter of 3 seconds ....No lights, no sound, nothing but a trail of smoke or heat behind  it .
content.summary: I was out in my yard observing the stars when something caught my eye to my right the east as i looked i saw something gray in color flying towards me, over me,  then past me as i turned to follow it i noticed it flying out of sight towards the west

content.detailedDescription: I was at home sitting out on my front porch smoking a cigarette then i felt like i was being watched. i looked up to the sky and noticed a light (yellowish in color), at first i thought it was an airplane but as the light got bigger it atopped in place. i continued to watch this object it did nothing for about 14 minutes. then the yellowish light flashed a couple timea following a bigger light and the object was gone after that. while observing felt at ease and was fascinated by such an object and curious of what it waa doing. when it disappeared i continued to watxh the aky incase it came back. a couple days later as i was waking up around 7am i looked beside my bed and saw an alien kneeling down looking straight at the wall. he/she was very skinny, no ears, small nose and mouth, had medium size black eyes, and was light gray/white in color. i have yet to spot anything after that but feel as though i may be being watched.
content.summary: Noticed orb of light in sky, watched it hovering in one spot. it startes to flicker then a flash of light and it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: I went out side my apartment this morning at about 8:00 am and noticed this clear glass looking see through looking tube like cylinder fly slowly straight up in the air as this was going on i was trying to get my neighbors attention to come out and see it got higher in the sky and the whole time seemed to be morphing into different weird shapes but then it reached it's top altitude and morphed into a weird colored looking plane flew west? and shortly disappeared. my neighbor came out and saw it just right after it had morphed into a plane but didn't see the whole event, it never made any sound and seemed like it was flying straight up into the air from a landing. i would like an investigator to contact me because i have seen several different ufo's and other strange objects come from around that same location and do have some things they would be very interested in seeing. i did't have my phone on me for the event but wanted to go back into my apartment to get it but i knew if i did by the time i came back out it would be gone. i do have a picture of another ufo from a different time earlier this summer though (but that's not what i would like to talk to the investigator about and show)
content.summary: See threw glass like object reflected sunoff it, kept morphing into different shapes then morphed into a weird looking plane thing went up straight into the air then leveled out fly a short distance then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Was at home at home with a friend watching a boxing match and went outside to smoke a cigar when i looked up and saw a bright red light traveling east towards me i immediately looked for other lights that would indicate a plane or helicopter but saw none as it was heading my direction went inside grabbed my phone and had my friend come out i started recording it and wathed it travel in a straight path sort of changing from red to grey color lost it behind a tree in my yard for about 5 seconds when it was back in view it was traveling southaway from us. and then it faded away ten to ffifteen seconds later! i felt excited and confused at what i was looking at!
content.summary: Saw a red orb traveling towards me for a min or so then made a right angle turn away

content.detailedDescription:
this happened in levittown, pa on august 16, 2013 at 9:00 p.M.  i took a bag of trash out to the screened enclosure.  as i opened the door, i looked up and across the street, above the houses, i saw a small orange ball in the sky.  thinking it was a firework i watched it to see if it would explode, but, it did not.  it came closer and then started moving very slowly toward the north.  a few seconds later another one appeared, looking exactly the same as the first.  it was slightly behind the first one, exactly in line with it.  all i could think is, "what in the world is this??"  out of the same spot in the sky came this fireball coming so fast that i stepped back.(you'll think this is really crazy, but, when it stopped up there in front of me all i could think was this thing acted like it knew me.)  i watched as it burned up in the sky, a clean burn, the whole ball in flame.  but, the flames were only coming from the top, not the sides or the bottom, but, the whole ball was on fire.  i took a few more steps toward it and it stayed up there, burning.  the two balls that came before it stood up in the sky and didn't move as if they were waiting for this third ball.  i wanted to run into the house to get the cell phone to take pictures, but didn't because i was afraid they would be gone when i came back out and because my feet felt planted to the cement of the driveway.  two cars came by and all i could do was point up to the sky and say, "look."  no one stopped.  i called twice for the guy next door, but he never came out.  the big fireball started to move very slowly falling in line with the other two balls (still not on fire)and they all moved very slowly toward the north.  i started to walk on the sidewalk, but didn't go far until they were out of sight to me...I just wanted to get back in the house. i looked at the clock and it was 9:05 p.M. 

i have searched all over and have found no pictures or video of what i saw. i called the newspaper and left a message on their voicemail asking if anyone had reported seeing lights in the sky and even if not, could they call me back...I never received a call.
content.summary: Two objects were pretty opaque, dull orange, and both the same size.  the third was a big ball totally on fire.

content.detailedDescription: We have with my family in the floor. i see to the sky, when i see this object. i take my camera and take photos and 1 video to this object. however this object was very upper and dont see very well in the photos or video. then, the clouds dont permit to see any more this object.
content.summary: When i see the object, this like a star, but in the day this dont see. the object was still

content.detailedDescription: On 10/21/2014 at about 9:15pm i was driving south on u.S. 283 around 8 miles south of baird tx. in callahan co. in the vehicle with me was my wife and a friend. we were returning home from an event in baird when a bright redish/orange light appeared ahead of us and at about our 10 o'clock and above 500 ft. a second light appeared more to the east and lower on the horizon. then a slightly smaller redish/orange light shot out vertically from the first light and went a short distance then both light hovered for a short time then went out. the light to the east went out also. we were talking about what we saw, and driving much slower, when the bright light appeared again,this time more to our 12 o'clock. it did the same thing, a light shot out vertically a short distance then stopped and both lights hovered for a short time before going out. we continued to drive slowly and discuss what we were seeing when the bright light appeared for a third time. this time another light appeared to the east. same thing, a light shot out, both lights hovered then all went out. that was the last time we saw anything. the entire event only took 5 to 10 minutes. we have lived in this area for 20 years and have never seen anything like this. this was weird!!!
content.summary: Observed redish/orange lights appear, split, hover then went out. repeated 2 more times
